resources.string: How much do you know about the original Star Wars trilogy?
1. What color is Luke Skywalker\'s lightsaber in Return of the Jedi?
2. What Jedi Master was found living in a swamp on Dagobah?
3. Which of the following characters are part of the Skywalker family?
4. Han Solo is quoted saying he completed the Kessel Run in less than how many parsecs?
6. The commander of the first Death Star was Grand Moff
